subject: America's Cup
Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: The hostility between America’s Cup rivals was apparent after the BMW Oracle president, Larry Ellison, refused to attend an owners news conference in Valencia, Spain, with his Alinghi counterpart, Ernesto Bertarelli.
snippet: The hostility between America’s Cup rivals was apparent after the BMW Oracle president, Larry Ellison, refused to attend an owners news conference in Valencia, Spain, with his Alinghi counterpart, Ernesto Bertarelli.
